promo.promoText:
If you purchase a combined hospital and extras policy before 31 July, you can claim immediately on many Extras including most general dental, optical, physio, chiro, remedial massage and more*

* Conditions
promo.discountText: Australian Unity offers a 4% discount to customers who choose to pay their premium by direct debit. This has been included in the price displayed.
